mapper.sql: ccl.id , ccl.coupon_id , ccl.name , ccl.type , ccl.vip_batch, ccl.condition_amount , ccl.pay_type , ccl.pay_amount , ccl.launch_num ,ccl.max_receive, ccl.remain_num , ccl.launch_start_time , ccl.launch_end_time , ccl.effective_start_time , ccl.effective_end_time,ccl.review_status , ccl.review_info , ccl.confirm_flag , ccl.forbid_flag , ccl.confirm_time , ccl.forbid_time , ccl.last_update , ccl.delete_flag , ccl.delete_time

CASE WHEN ccl.review_status = 3 THEN 0 WHEN ccl.review_status = 0 THEN 1 WHEN ccl.review_status = 1 AND ccl.confirm_flag = 0 THEN 2 WHEN ccl.review_status = 1 AND ccl.confirm_flag = 1 AND now() <= ccl.launch_start_time THEN 3 WHEN ccl.review_status = 1 AND ccl.confirm_flag = 1 AND ccl.forbid_flag = 0 AND now() > ccl.launch_start_time AND now() < ccl.launch_end_time THEN 4 WHEN ccl.review_status = 1 AND ccl.confirm_flag = 1 AND ccl.forbid_flag = 0 AND now() > ccl.launch_end_time THEN 5 WHEN ccl.forbid_flag = 1 THEN 6 END AS status
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM card_coupon_launch ccl INNER JOIN card_coupon cc ON cc.id = ccl.coupon_idc AND cc.delete_flag = 0

SELECT , , cc.name AS coupon_name, cc.type AS coupon_type FROM card_coupon_launch ccl INNER JOIN card_coupon cc ON cc.id = ccl.coupon_id AND ccl.delete_flag = 0
ORDER BY ccl.create_time DESC

SELECT , cc.name AS coupon_name, cc.type AS coupon_type, cc.batch, cc.thirdparty_shop_id FROM card_coupon_launch ccl INNER JOIN card_coupon cc ON cc.id = ccl.coupon_id AND cc.delete_flag = 0 WHERE ccl.coupon_id = #{couponId} AND ccl.delete_flag = 0

SELECT , , cc.name AS coupon_name, ccts.store_id AS ccts_store_id, ccts.ratio AS ccts_ratio, ss.name AS ccts_shop_name, ss.sub_commercial_type_name AS ccts_sub_commercial_type_name FROM card_coupon_launch ccl INNER JOIN card_coupon cc ON cc.id = ccl.coupon_id cc.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN card_coupon_trigger_scope ccts ON ccts.launch_id = ccl.id AND ccts.delete_flag = 0 WHERE ccl.id = #{id} AND ccl.delete_flag = 0
